titleStmt.title: Short instructions for the executors and administrators of free-men in exhibiting an inventory, securing orphans portions, &c. : with several orders of the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen relating thereunto.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Frontispiece contains woodcut of the arms of the city of London.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
